comment.author: 89161852@N06
comment._content:
For information...
Sopwith 1 1/2 Strutter 9706 was accepted 30/11/1916 as a Type 9700 Single Seat Bomber, received by 3 Wing at Luxeuil 16/12/1916, coded '2', moved with 3 Wing to Ochey 24/12/1916, transferred to French government 20/4/1917 and later captured by the Germans, date unknown.
It appears to have either retained its 3 Wing code in French service, or been lost soon after transfer.
